TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具中，為 Web 伺服器控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項呈現的其中一個它的範本，取決於是否在使用者登入主控件網站，並包含登入的使用者帳戶的角色。The control renders one of its templates, determined by whether a user is logged on to the host Web site, and the roles that contain the logged-on user account. 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換到設計檢視中，標記原始程式碼描述控制會剖析並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 類別提供設計階段支援控制項。The class provides design-time support for the control. 屬性會傳回物件，其通常包含物件，衍生自類別設計工具，在繼承樹狀結構中的每個層級。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. 屬性會傳回範本相關聯的範本群組集合控制項。The property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated control. 屬性一律會傳回`true`，指出設計工具會建立相關聯的暫存複本控制項以產生設計階段標記。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 類別方法會提供下列功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法會傳回用來呈現關聯的標記控制項在設計階段。The methods return the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time. 方法會取得在目前的範本時未定義的設計階段呈現相關聯控制項的預留位置的標記。The method gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when the current template is not defined. 方法，提供在設計階段發生錯誤時呈現關聯的控制項的標記。The method provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred. - 方法會傳回目前範本的相關聯的序列化的複本控制項。The method returns a serialized copy of the current template for the associated control. 方法會從序列化控制項範本的複本設定相關聯控制項的區域。The method sets a region of the associated control from a serialized copy of a control template. - 方法準備設計工具，以檢視、 編輯和設計關聯控制項。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 至相關聯的控制項變更時，呼叫方法。The method is called when there is a change to the associated control. 方法用來移除屬性，加入其他屬性，或遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。The method is used to remove properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充外觀和行為的控制項衍生自類別控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance and behavior of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 此範例衍生`MyLoginView`控制項從。The example derives the `MyLoginView` control from the . `MyLoginView`是一份控制項。The `MyLoginView` is a copy of the control. 此範例也衍生`MyLoginViewDesigner`類別從類別，並套用屬性`MyLoginViewDesigner`上`MyLoginView`控制項。The example also derives the `MyLoginViewDesigner` class from the class and applies a attribute for the `MyLoginViewDesigner` on the `MyLoginView` control. `MyLoginViewDesigner` Control 覆寫下列成員：The `MyLoginViewDesigner` control overrides the following members: - 方法以進行屬性顯示在**屬性**在設計階段的方格。The method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. - 橙色周圍繪製框線，使其範圍更明顯可見控制項的方法。The method to draw an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. - 預留位置，其中包含錯誤訊息中，以紅色轉譯時，產生標記的方法粗體文字。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. - 方法來產生標記為一個預留位置，包含控制項所定義的角色群組的名稱。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that contains the names of the role groups that are defined for the control. - 方法會擲回例外狀況，如果相關聯的控制項不是`MyLoginView`物件。The method to throw an exception, if the associated control is not a `MyLoginView` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立相關聯控制項或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項的標記。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 字串，包含在設計階段用來呈現 的標記。

span.span: A string containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法設定的範本索引相關聯的控制項目前的設計階段索引，然後原因相關聯控制項來重新建立和繫結它的子控制項，如有必要的資料。The method sets the template index of the associated control to the current design-time index, and then causes the associated control to recreate and data bind its child controls, if necessary. 下一步呼叫基底方法，以產生標記。Next, the calls the base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫繼承自一個類別中的方法類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀在設計階段的類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 此範例會繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見控制項周圍橘色框線。The example draws an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法，請務必呼叫基底方法，因為它最後透過數個覆寫層級上呼叫控制項或一份要產生標記的控制項。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立物件樣板編輯區域視覺化設計工具介面，然後再初始化它做為範本。The method creates an object for a template editing area on the visual designer surface, and then initializes it as a template. 如果尚未定義任何範本，字串會顯示，提示您按一下以開始編輯。If no templates are defined, a string is displayed that prompts you to click to begin editing. 預先定義的常數用來產生傳回的標記。A predefined constant is used to generate the returned markup. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫繼承自一個類別中的方法類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀在設計階段的類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 此範例會繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見控制項周圍橘色框線。The example draws an orange border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#4)]

summary.span: 傳回於設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項之目前範本的序列化複本。

span.span: Returns a serialized copy of the current template that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 字串，包含於設計階段用來呈現關聯的 之範本的序列化複本。

span.span: A string containing a serialized copy of the template used to render the associated at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果範本實作介面可以取自`region`參數，方法會傳回持續性的範本。If a template implementing the interface can be obtained from the `region` parameter, the method returns the persisted template. 否則，它會呼叫基底方法，以產生內容。Otherwise, it calls the base method to generate the content. 可以還原序列化的範本到控制項使用方法。The serialized template can be restored to the control by using the method.

returns.span: 字串，包含在設計介面上呈現給替代符號的標記文字。

span.span: A string containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會先格式化指定相關聯的目前範本的名稱與字串訊息控制，也會指定是空的範本。The method first formats a string message that specifies the name of the current template of the associated control and also specifies that the template is empty. 然後在會產生包含該訊息的預留位置的標記。Then the generates the markup for a placeholder containing that message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫繼承自一個類別中的方法類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀在設計階段的類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 這個範例會產生包含所有名稱的預留位置標記定義相關聯控制項的物件。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the names of all the objects that are defined for the associated control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#5)]

span.span: A string that contains the markup used to render the associated at design time after an error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 錯誤設計階段控制項呈現為面板包含型別名稱、 控制項名稱與宣告，並描述錯誤的訊息。The error design-time control renders as a panel that contains the type name, the control name, and messages announcing and describing the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫繼承自一個類別中的方法類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀在設計階段的類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 這個範例會產生一個預留位置，包含錯誤訊息，以紅色粗體文字呈現標記。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#2)]

summary.span: 準備設計工具，以檢視、編輯和設計關聯控制項。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視覺化設計工具呼叫方法準備好要用來呈現的設計工具時控制項。The visual designer calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 和其基底的方法設定屬性和設定事件所需的設計工具的作業。The and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`參數是與這個設計工具或一份相關聯的控制項控制項。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫繼承自一個類別中的方法類別，以變更衍生自控制項的行為在設計階段的類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the behavior of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 此範例會擲回，如果相關聯的控制項不是`MyLoginView`物件。The example throws an , if the associated control is not a `MyLoginView` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#6)]

summary.span: 與這個設計工具關聯的控制項有變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when there is a change to the control that is associated with this designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時，會呼叫事件相關聯的控制項執行。The method is called when the event of the associated control executes. 一般而言，這是在回應上控制項的屬性變更 (例如，**屬性**方格變更)。Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). 如果控制項範本已變更，**屬性**重新整理方格。If the control template is changed, the **Properties** grid is refreshed. 驗證目前的範本索引是否有效，然後呼叫基底方法。The verifies that the current template index is valid, and then calls the base method.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格的顯示中移除屬性或新增屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，以衍生自方法来遮蔽各種控制項屬性與對應的設計階段屬性在設計工具實作，並將屬性加入到或從其中移除屬性**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 方法適用於屬性屬性，因此它不會出現在**屬性**方格。The method applies the attribute of the property so that it does not appear in the **Properties** grid. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法繼承自的類別中類別，以變更**屬性**方格控制項衍生自設計類別時間。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the **Properties** grid of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 此範例可讓屬性顯示在**屬性**方格。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/CS/LoginViewDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginViewDesigner/VB/LoginViewDesigner.vb#3)]

span.span: Override the method to add properties to, remove properties from, or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

summary.span: 從控制項樣板的序列化複本，設定關聯控制項的區域。

span.span: Sets a region of the associated control from a serialized copy of a control template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析為相關聯的序列化的範本所指定的控制項`content`參數，然後可使用範本來更新所指定之控制項的區域和屬性`region`參數。The method parses a serialized template for the associated control that is specified by the `content` parameter, and then uses the template to update the region of the control that is specified by the property of the `region` parameter. 目前範本的控制項可以使用序列化方法。The current template of the control can be serialized using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection TemplateGroups { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection TemplateGroups
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::Design::TemplateGroupCollection ^ TemplateGroups { System::Web::UI::Design::TemplateGroupCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 針對關聯控制項的欄位，取得範本群組的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.

value.span: ，包含 控制項中每個範本的項目。

span.span: A containing an element for each template in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得物件從基底屬性，並將物件，其中包含單一物件之匿名範本 （對應至沒有使用者登入），如登入的範本，以及對於每個中的項目集合相關聯的控制權傳輸至。The property gets a object from the base property, and then adds objects that contain a single object for the anonymous template (which corresponds to no user logged on), for the logged-on template, and for each element in the collection of the associated control to the . 傳回此給呼叫者。The returns this to the caller.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool UsePreviewControl { get; }
.property instance bool UsePreviewControl
Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出設計工具是否應該使用暫存複本，而非與設計工具關聯的實際控制項，來產生設計階段標記。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為屬性一律會是`true`，設計工具屬性會傳回一份相關聯的控制項以產生設計階段標記。Because the property is always `true`, the designer property returns a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 屬性，方法是保存實際建立複本控制，再剖析保存的控制項字串。The property creates the copy by persisting the actual control, then parsing the persisted control string. 複製的控制項並不會影響任何持續性的實際。The copied control does not affect any persistence for the actual . 如果屬性覆寫以傳回`false`，設計師會使用相關聯控制其本身，以產生設計階段標記，以及控制項的設計階段變更將會保存在網頁標記原始程式碼。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated control itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.

para.span: 您可以覆寫屬性，以傳回或要判定其是否標示控制項類別層級為基礎的值屬性。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level attribute.
If the is not overridden, the ignores the .
